english: A full body workout routine is a strength training program built around training most or all of the entire body during each workout rather than splitting it up into different parts.
simpledchinese: 对于普通健身爱好者来说全身性训练是增肌和提升力量最好的方法之一，进行全身性的训练不仅能够优化训练频率，还能让身体在每周内都能得到很好的恢复，同时还可以节约时间。每周只要抽出三天训练，对于新手这更是友好，为了最大限度地发挥全身训练的益处，在每次训练中都需要针对训练身体的大肌群，需要找到合适训练的平衡点，这样肌肉和力量就会随着训练时间的推移不断增长。

english: Please set the range of reps and how many sets you should perform, which is dictated by your training goals.
simpledchinese: 依据训练目标，请设定组数和次数范围。

english: Please enable the 'Overloading Hepler' function, The App will help you to gradually increase the lifting weights if you hit the top of the rep range.
simpledchinese: 开启'重量提升'后：当训练达到设定组数、次数，APP会为您提升下一次训练的重量。

english: Also, you can configure the success times before moving to the next training level safely.
simpledchinese: 设定成功次数，制定了完成训练目标多少次后，才会提升重量

english: When you have finished the sets and max reps ({SET} sets and {MAX REPS} reps) for {SUCCESS TIMES} times, the next lifting weight will be increased by {INCREASE PERCENT}%.
simpledchinese: 当您成功 {SUCCESS TIMES} 次完成上面设定的训练目标（{SET} 组，{MAX REPS} 个）后，下一次训练的重量会提升 {INCREASE PERCENT} %

english: The best workout plan is a personalized one
simpledchinese: 最好的训练计划来自个性化定制

english: How many training days does your plan contains?
Please choose a date within 90 days
Please complete the ongoing workout first.
Workout targets in the last {} days.
This info is optional and can be added later. Your data is kept secure, private, and never sent or sold to anyone else.
simpledchinese: 此信息可选填。您的数据是安全、私密的，绝不会发送或出售给其他任何人。

english: This info is optional and can be added later. You can give yourself a nickname and leave a contact phone number for the coming community functions using. Also, your data is kept secure, private, and never sent or sold to anyone else.
simpledchinese: 此信息可选填，您也可以留下基本的昵称和联系方式，这部分信息可能会在未来的社区功能中使用。您的数据是安全、私密的，绝不会发送或出售给其他任何人。

english: Pocket Gym is a workout log app focusing on the simplicity of usage.
simpledchinese: 口袋健身，是一款专注于使用简易化的力量训练记录应用。

english: Use the calculator below to estimate your one-rep max based on the amount of weight you can lift on a given move and the number of clean reps you can achieve before muscle failure.
simpledchinese: 根据您在给某个动作中可以举起的重量，以及在竭尽全力之前达到的最大重复数，估算您的1RM。

english: Input your gender and measurements below to receive a body fat index based on average values. The body fat index is not an indicator of fitness level since the calculation is made with no regard to height or weight.
simpledchinese: 在下方输入您的性别和一些测量值，以获得基于平均值的体脂指数。体脂指数不是健康水平的指标，因为估算时没有考虑身高或体重。

english: Knowing BMI can help adult men and women understand their overall health. Use the BMI calculator below to determine your body mass index by inputting your height and weight.
simpledchinese: 了解 BMI 可以帮助成年男性和女性了解整体的健康状况。使用下面的计算器通过输入身高和体重来确定体重指数。

english: The daily calorie intake calculator will help you calculate the number of calories you should consume in line with your goals.
simpledchinese: 每日卡路里摄入量计算器将帮助您计算每日消耗的卡路里数量。

english: Calculate The Calories Burned By Heart Rate
simpledchinese: 基于心率计算消耗的热量

english: Burning more calories becomes easier with a better knowledge of the connection between the heart rate and the metabolism process.
simpledchinese: 基于心率和新陈代谢过程之间的联系，可以估算出消耗的热量。
标记热身训练, 数据不计入训练统计内

english: {} is used in the calculation of weight Volume, where 'Volume' = 'Weight' x 'Reps' x '{}'.
simpledchinese: {}用于训练容量的计算，训练容量 = 重量 x 次数 x {}'。

english: If you use two 25kg dumbbells in your workout and only record the weight of one dumbbell (25kg), your {} should be 2. The final weight volume should be 25 x reps x 2.
simpledchinese: 如您在训练中使用两个25公斤的哑铃并且只记录一个哑铃的重量，那么您的{}应该是 2。最终的重量容量应该是是'25'x 次数 x 2。

english: Also if you lift a 20kg bar with two 20kg plates, one on each side, you should record the total 60kg (20 + 20 x 2) as the weight and 'Multiplier' normally can be 1, but if you lift this bar and plats using each arm alternately, you can set the 'Multiplier' to be 2.
simpledchinese: 再如，训练使用的是20kg杠铃再加每边10kg的杠铃片，您应该将总和60kg (20 + 20 x 2) 记为重量，“乘数”通常是1，但如果您交替使用单个手臂来举起这个杠铃杆时，您可将“乘数”设置为2。

english: If you have any dissatisfaction or suggestions, please let us know, and we will consider them carefully and make improvements. Thanks!
simpledchinese: 使用中您有任何不满意的地方或改进的建议，请告诉我们，我们会认真考虑并做出改进。谢谢!

english: Unlock Pro to log your workout
simpledchinese: 解锁Pro，记录您的每次训练
记录日常训练更加容易。

english: Review your workout history more clearly in the calendar.
simpledchinese: 基于日历更加清晰的回顾训练。

english: Review training results based on muscle parts and identify the workout weaknesses in time.
simpledchinese: 根据肌肉部位回顾训练，及时发现薄弱环节。

english: Buy the professional version and encourage the developer.
simpledchinese: 购买专业版本，给开发者一个鼓励。

english: Subscribe the Pro plan, and cancel the workouts' number limitation.
simpledchinese: 购买专业版，取消训练次数限制。

english: Free Limit: {TIMES} free workouts per month
simpledchinese: 免费版：每月{TIMES}次免费训练

english:
Cancel your subscription at any time. 
Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period.
 You can cancel the subscription at your App Store account settings.
simpledchinese:
订阅将自动续订，但随时可以取消您的订阅。
在当前订阅期结束前24小时以内，您可取消订阅。App Store 帐户中或这里都可以取消。

english: Since you have exceeded the maximum number of workouts, please subscribe to the Pro plan.
simpledchinese: 您已超过了最大训练次数限制，请购买专业版

english: You are a Pro user. Congratulations!
Please Use a Workout Plan or Design a Routine as a Start.
simpledchinese: 请从计划或一次训练开始。

english: How many days per week could you train?
simpledchinese: 您每周可以训练多少天？

english: Data recovery is based on cloud backup, which may cause local workout data modified!
simpledchinese: 数据恢复基于cloud备份，但可能会导致本地锻炼数据被修改！

english: The latest five backups will be stored for restoration. Once they reach the limit of five backups, the oldest backups will be replaced by the newly created ones.
simpledchinese: 应用将存储最新的五个备份以进行恢复。一旦达到五个备份的限制，最旧的备份将被新创建的备份替换。

english: If the routine content is selected as 'sets, reps', the lifting weight of the next workout will be determined by the previous records.
simpledchinese: 如果模版内容选择为‘组，次数’，每次训练的重量则由上一次的记录来决定。

english: Background data recovery has started, which will take a few minutes. Please do not repeat the recovery operation.
simpledchinese: 后台数据恢复已开始，需要几分钟时间，请勿重复恢复操作

english: Tap here, and move files to the root folder.
simpledchinese: 点这里，把文件移到根目录。

english: Where to place the routine file?
The workout plan has been set, Please check the calendar.
simpledchinese: 锻炼计划已设定，请查看日历。

english: The Workout Routine has been Set, and Please Check the Calendar.
simpledchinese: 锻炼计划已设定，请查看日历。

english: Workout Routines are Categorized in Folders.
simpledchinese: 训练模版按照文件夹分类

english: Use Routines and Make Exercise a Daily Habit.
simpledchinese: 创建模版，养成日常健身习惯

english: Start a New Routine and Stick To It.
Touch the Head Bar, and Give your Workout a Name.
simpledchinese: 开始前，点击导航栏左侧，请先为训练起个名字。

english: Get Started by Adding Exercises to Your Workout.
Get Started by Adding Exercises to Your Workout.
Lack of exercise, need something easy to get started
simpledchinese: 缺少运动，从一些简单的训练开始

english: Had some training experience, need systematic guidance
simpledchinese: 有一些训练的经验，但还需系统的指导

english: An experienced trainer, could take on some hard challenges
simpledchinese: 拥有丰富的训练经验，可以应对更大的挑战

english: Score: (Each Trained muscle's Sets x Percent ) / Muscle's Total Count
simpledchinese: 得分：(每个练过肌肉的次数 x 百分比) / 肌肉总数
训练频率（次, 百分比）

english: For the {}, you can use the following exercises
simpledchinese: 针对{}，您可练习以下动作

english: Settings  > [your name] > iCloud, then turn on iCloud Drive and Pocket Gym
simpledchinese: 设置  > [您的名称] > iCloud, 开启 [iCloud 云盘] 和 [口袋健身]

english: What is your birth year and month?
Please send us feedback, ideas, and feature requests.
simpledchinese: 向我们发送反馈意见、想法和功能要求。

english: What went wrong? We will solve it as fast as possible.
simpledchinese: 出了什么问题，我们会以最快的速度为您解决。

english:
APP is free and available, and many new features will be introduced soon.

But still, please purchase the PLUS service so you can ask me directly for function requirements, and I will be happy to help you. Also, as a PLUS user, the app will always be free for you, no matter what pricing method you use in the future!
simpledchinese:
APP完全免费、可用，许多新功能正在不断推出。

但还是请您购买PLUS服务，这样您就可以直接向我提出功能需求，我会竭诚为您服务。而且，作为PLUS用户，应用无论未来使用何种定价方式，您都可以完全免费适用！

english: Please contact me if you want new functions.
simpledchinese: 您可以提出任何功能需求，我会竭诚为您服务。

english: Dear friend, thanks for the purchase!

If you have any questions, new ideas, or suggestions, please let me know (via Twitter or Email), and I will give you priority service.

Also, you can use all the features free of charge, no matter how priced the app is in the future.
simpledchinese:
如果您有任何问题、新的想法、建议，请告诉我（email），我都会优先为您服务。

而且，无论APP将来如何定价，你将完全免费使用全部功能。

english: Please set up a mail account first.
simpledchinese: 请先设置一个邮件账户。

english: Go to Settings > Mail > Accounts, Tap Add Account, then select your email provider.
simpledchinese: 设置 > 邮件 > 账户，点击 添加账户 ，然后选择你的电子邮件提供商。

english:
Still not workout yet?
 Try to start with a plan or a single training.
simpledchinese:
还没开始锻炼？
试着从计划或着一次训练开始。

english: How to start a workout quickly?
simpledchinese: 如何快速开始一次训练？

english: Just tap the '+' button at the bottom and start tracking your sets.
simpledchinese: 点击'+'，开始记录你的训练。

english: How to reuse a workout routine that you often do?
simpledchinese: 如何创建一个训练模版？

english:
You can create a routine directly and manage them in different folders. 
Also, you can convert one from a finished workout if you want to reuse it as a template after training.
simpledchinese:
你可以直接新建一个训练模版，并通过不同的文件夹来管理。
此外，你也可以将完成的训练中转为模版。

english: When to use a workout plan?

If you are new to strength training or just curious, you can pick one workout plan as your startup. 
By the way, all the workout plans will be updated.
simpledchinese:
如果你是力量训练的新手或仅仅是好奇，你都可以挑选一个锻炼计划作为你的开始。
而且，所有的锻炼计划都会不断更新。

english: Data will be recovered from {}'s iCloud account.
simpledchinese: 数据将从{}的iCloud账户中恢复

english: The chart below shows the number of times you have a workout of the corresponding muscle in the past {} days.
simpledchinese: 下面图表展示了您过去{}天里相应肌肉（动作）的训练频次。

english: Design a workout routine to perform later.
simpledchinese: 创建训练模版，方便未来训练复用。

english: Please select a folder to preserve the routine.
simpledchinese: 请选择一个文件夹来保存模版。

english: There is already an ongoing training.
simpledchinese: 已经有一个进行中的训练了。
